author: Gary
title: Flamingo and Reflection in the Galapagos Islands
text:
Flamingo and Reflection in the Galapagos Islands 
Camera NIKON D300S Aperture f/11 Exposure Time 1/200 
The one bird Iâ€™ve seen in more places around the world than any other is the flamingo . I have seen flamingos in North America, South America, Europe and Africa. Flamingos are one of the few global species which can be found on most continents. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
